title: Spinal Modeling Made Simple
text: Designed for industry leaders, Spinertia leverages advanced AI and a proprietary algorithm for precise spinal curvature measurement and real-time movement visualization. It's an essential tool for injury prevention, rehabilitation, and enhancing athletic performance, setting new standards in sports medicine through precision, innovation, and practicality.

section.title: Why Antd?
section.content: Ant Design is a React UI library that has a lot of easy-to-use components for building elegant UI.

section.title: Why styled-components?
section.content: Styled Components gives you total control over your components.
